cards.title: Fenrir
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card now
Reduce Damage dealt to hero targets by 1 until the start of your next turn

openingLines.default: In the name of Moonlight Investigations, I request you desist.
openingLines.HatiCharacter: Your shenanigans are going to destroy the city!
openingLines.RedHoodCharacter: Perhaps you should be hunting the [i]real[/i] monsters!

cards.title: Fenrir
cards.powers: {Fenrir} deals up to 3 targets 1 Sonic damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: Increase damage dealt by Heroes by 1
One hero may play a card now.

cards.title: Lycan Form
body: Switch to Fenrir's Wolf Form now. When this card leaves play, switch to Fenrir's Human form.
Increase damage dealt by Fenrir to Non-Hero targets by 1.
cards.flavorText: The Power of Wolf Does not me Fright

cards.title: The Pale Moon Pendant
body: {human} At the end of your turn, Fenrir regains 1 HP
{wolf} Reduce the damage dealt to Fenrir by 1
powers: Fenrir deals 2 Radiant damage to 1 target. If Fenrir deals damage this way, you may play a card.

cards.title: Hunger of The Wolf
body: {human} At the start of your turn, Fenrir may deal himself 1 Psychic damaage. If he does, put Lycan Form in play.
{wolf} When Fenrir reduces a target to 0 HP, he regains 1 HP

flavorQuotes.text: Sometimes, I can't hold the wolf in.

cards.title: Frenzy
body: At the start of your turn, if Fenrir is not in Wolf Form, or if there are no cards under this, destroy this card. Otherwise destroy a card under this one.
When Fenrir destroys a target or a device, put it under this card. Increase damage dealt by Fenrir by 1 for every 2 cards under this one.
When this card enters play, destroy a target with 3HP or less or a Device.

cards.title: Meditate
body: {human} When you would draw a card, search for one instead. At the start of your turn, destroy this card.
{wolf} At the end of your turn, destroy this card and draw a card.
If Fenrir would deal or be dealt damage, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: A deep mindstate and{BR}you might yet reach him.

cards.title: Geek And Sunder
body: {human} Draw 2 cards
{wolf} Destroy an Ongoing or Device card, then deal its owner 2 Melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: A beautiful mind, razor sharp claws.{BR}What's not to love.

cards.title: Furious Strikes
body: Deal 1 target 1 Melee damage
{wolf} Deal up to 2 targets 2 Melee damage. If {Frenzy} is in play, Deal up to 2 targets 2 Melee Damage

flavorQuotes.text: You have me surrounded?{BR}I doubt you've met my husband.

cards.title: Natural Weapons
cards.body: {wolf} When Fenrir deals Psychic damage to a target, reduce damage dealt by that target until the start of your next turn.
powers: {human} One hero may draw a card now.{BR}{wolf} Fenrir deals 1 target 1 Melee then 1 Psychic Damage. If {Frenzy} is in play, increase the Melee damage by 2

flavorQuotes.text: I shall rend you all in twain{BR}should you hurt him!

cards.title: Unleash Yourself
body: {human} Search for Lycan Form and put it into play. You may use Fenrir's innate power now.
{wolf} You may search for Frenzy and put it into play. If you do not, deal 1 target 3 Melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Sometimes you just have to let loose.

cards.title: Maintain Control
body: {human} At the end of your turn, you may discard any number of Feral cards. You may draw as many cards as you discarded this way.
{wolf} The first time you play a Feral card each turn, you may play a non-Feral card.

flavorQuotes.text: Just focus on your center,{BR}bring the two halves together

cards.title: Moonlight Investigations
cards.body: You may draw an extra card on your draw phase.
cards.powers: You may search your deck for a Non-Feral card and put it into your hand. You may destroy this card to play a card now.
cards.flavorText: We take the cases no one else will

cards.title: The Other Hand
body: {human} You may play an additional card on your play phase.
{wolf} The first time Fenrir deals Melee damage each turn, he then deals that target 1 Psychic damage.

cards.title: Tame Yourself
body: {human} Search for Meditate and put it into play.
{wolf} Destroy all cards under Frenzy, then destroy Frenzy. For each card destroyed this way, Fenrir regains 1 HP. If no cards are destroyed this way, destroy Lycan Form.

cards.title: By Pale Moonlight
body: Search for the Pale Moon Pendant and put it into play.
{human} {Fenrir} regains 2 HP
{wolf} Increase the next damage dealt to a non-Hero target by {Fenrir} by 2

flavorQuotes.text: The Moon is the only light.

cards.title: Great Cleave
body: {human} Reveal the top card of your deck, if it is a One-shot, put it into play, otherwise discard it.
{wolf} Deal 1 target 5 Melee damage.{BR}If the target would be reduced to less than 0 HP, {Fenrir} deals the difference to a second target.

flavorQuotes.text: Nothing will stop him until he finds me.

cards.title: Transforming Howl
body: {human} Search for Lycan Form and put it into play.
{wolf} {Fenrir} deals each Non-Hero target 1 Sonic damage.
cards.flavorText: A howl that instills fear to all{BR}who threaten Riverport.
